isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC) SYSTEM - ProStar - SYSTEM OPERATING CONTROLS - FRONT hvac SYSTEM

svcsubsec.title: SYSTEM OPERATING CONTROLS - FRONT hvac SYSTEM

svcsubsecinfo.para: The operation of the front Blend-Air system is based on standard automotive air conditioning and heating principles.

note.para: The following paragraphs describe operation of the front HVAC system only. On vehicles equipped with sleeper cabs, separate control panels make it possible for the front and rear HVAC systems to operate in different modes and at different temperatures. For rapid heating or cooling of the entire cab/sleeper area both systems should be set to the same approximate temperature range.
